text:
Mr. & Mrs. Smith is a 2005 American romantic action comedy  directed by Doug Liman and written by Simon Kinberg. The film stars Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie as a bored upper-middle class married couple surprised to learn that they are assassins belonging to competing agencies, and that they have been assigned to kill each other.
Besides being a box office hit, it also established Pitt and Jolie's relationship.
